Experiment Method.Assay Method: Inducible cell model with autophagy/proteasome inhibition

Material used.Description: Inducible expression of wild-type and A30P SNCA in PC12/TetOn cells with 3-MA (autophagy inhibitor) or MG132 (proteasome inhibitor).

Readout description.Result Description: A30P variant aggregates when autophagy (3-MA) or proteasome (MG132) is inhibited, while wild-type SNCA does not.
Wild-type SNCA does not aggregate under autophagy/proteasome inhibition.

Biological replicates.Description: Replication details not specified in the abstract.

Technical replicates.Description: Replication details not specified in the abstract.

Basic positive control.Description: Controls not explicitly described in the abstract.

Basic negative control.Description: Controls not explicitly described in the abstract.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No aggregation observed in wild-type SNCA under inhibitor conditions.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Aggregation detected in A30P variant under inhibitor conditions.

Approved assay.Rationale: Cell-based models and inhibitor-induced aggregation assays are standard in Parkinson's disease research.
